name: evcc
description: evcc is an EV charging controller that optimizes car charging based on solar production, tariffs, and household loads. It connects to wallboxes, inverters, and meters, and offers a web UI to monitor and configure charging behavior.

features.title: Solar Optimization
features.description: Charge your EV with excess solar power. Maximize self-consumption

features.title: Tariff Awareness
features.description: Charge during cheap electricity periods. Minimize charging costs

features.title: Wallbox Control
features.description: Manage charging stations intelligently. Smart power distribution

features.title: Load Management
features.description: Balance household and EV consumption. Prevent grid overload

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor and control charging remotely. Complete visibility

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own EV charging controller. Complete energy independence
